name.str: Sanguine Grimoire: The Rite of Sacrifice
name.str_pl: Sanguine Grimoires: The Rite of Sacrifice

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual creates vitae through the sacrifice of an animal.

A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual curse's the target's flesh, nearly stopping natural healing and even preventing any occult methods of healing from affecting the target.

A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual causes a surge of bloodlust that enhances your combat prowess but makes it hard to concentrate on anything but violence.

name.str: Sanguine Grimoire: Sign of the Inferno
name.str_pl: Sanguine Grimoires: Sign of the Inferno

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual provides immunity against heat and flames.

A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual provides supernatural strength and resilience akin to that of the legendary dragon, though with a correspondingly increased appetite.

name.str: Sanguine Grimoire: Calling the Bloody-Handed Walker
name.str_pl: Sanguine Grimoires: Calling the Bloody-Handed Walker

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual summons a being of animated blood that will savage your enemies.

A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual concentrates all of your hatred and anger into a single searing glare, freezing your target in place as though they were a rabbit and you are a snake..
A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual drains your target's life, restoring your own stamina and sleepiness in the process.
A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual drains your target's life, restoring your own stamina and sleepiness in the process.

name.str: Sanguine Grimoire: Calling the Denizens of Below
name.str_pl: Sanguine Grimoires: Calling the Denizens of Below

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual summons an ashen revenant, a denizen of the Beyond with a hunger for flesh--though whether yours or your enemies', who can say.

name.str: Sanguine Grimoire: Fashioning the Flesh-woven Titan
name.str_pl: Sanguine Grimoires: Fashioning the Flesh-woven Titan

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual weaves blood and flesh together into a titan that will crush those before it.  It requires a significant amount of corpses to create.

name.str: Sanguine Grimoire: Traveling the Sanguine Road
name.str_pl: Sanguine Grimoires: Traveling the Sanguine Road

description: A grimoire containing the steps and rituals necessary to learn a ritual of blood magic.  This ritual allows you to sink into a bloodstain on the ground and emerge from any other nearby bloodstain.
